IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [fssynwrls999_stgsynwrkls999_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://fssynwrls999@stgsynwrkls999.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE     = HADOOP 
	)
GO

DROP  EXTERNAL DATA   SOURCE [abfss_ds_acl_test] 
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [abfss_ds_acl_test] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'abfss://fssynwrls999@stgsynwrkls999.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE       = HADOOP--, 
	)
GO



https://stgsynwrkls999.blob.core.windows.net/fssynwrls999/COL/DS_UC_COKEY_TEXT.CSV


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test_external_data_acl
(
RequestID	[varchar](255)		,
SPRAS	[varchar](255)		,
COKEY	[varchar](255)		,
LTEXT	[varchar](255)		
)
WITH (LOCATION='COL/DS_UC_COKEY_TEXT.CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = [abfss_ds_acl_test],  
    FILE_FORMAT = FF_TEXTFORMAT_DEMO,
    REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
    REJECT_VALUE = 0
)




CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE TB_ACL_TEST01 (
	[timeperiod] varchar(8000),
	[flow1] int,
	[occupancy1] float,
	[speed1] float,
	[flow2] int,
	[occupancy2] float,
	[speed2] float,
	[flow3] int,
	[occupancy3] float,
	[speed3] float,
	[flow4] int,
	[occupancy4] float,
	[speed4] float,
	[flow5] int,
	[occupancy5] float,
	[speed5] float,
	[flow6] int,
	[occupancy6] float,
	[speed6] float,
	[flow7] int,
	[occupancy7] float,
	[speed7] float,
	[flow8] int,
	[occupancy8] float,
	[speed8] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'part-r-00000-ddaee723-f3f6-4f25-a34b-3312172aa6d7.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [fssynwrls999_stgsynwrkls999_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM TB_ACL_TEST01
GO
